allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add multi-user authentication and database support

- Set up Prisma with PostgreSQL for data persistence
- Implement NextAuth for user authentication
- Add beta key system for user registration
- Create login/signup UI with beta key validation
- Migrate from localStorage to database storage
- Add API routes for wallets and portfolio snapshots
- Update portfolio history tracking (14 days, 30-min intervals)
- Add user session management and sign out
- Include Vercel deployment configuration
- Add comprehensive deployment guide

Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
